question: Who has been appointed as the coach of India's hockey men's team?
explanation: Hockey India has appointed Harendra Singh as coach of India's men's team, while Sjoerd Marijne will take over as chief coach of women's side. Harendra led the junior men's hockey team to the World Cup title in 2016. Before joining the Indian women's team, Marijne had a successful tenure with the Netherlands' women's team.
